snippet: New York Road Runners, which was criticized over its handling of the canceled New York City Marathon, has had fewer finishers at its races this year.
abstract: Questions persist about future of the New York Road Runners Club, which faces declining participation and competition from rival organizers; group faced public outcry for its mishandling of New York City Marathon following Hurricane Sandy.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and ANDREW W. LEHREN

lead_paragraph: New York Road Runners, which was criticized over its handling of the canceled New York City Marathon, has had fewer finishers at its races this year.

headline.seo: Road Runners Facing More Difficulty 4 Months After Marathon Uproar
headline.main: Road Runners Facing More Difficulty 4 Months After Marathon Uproar
headline.print_headline: Road Runners Facing Difficulty Months After Marathon Uproar
